customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
A background story for an Adventure Challenge, huh... Let me think... So, a band of Abyss Mages are starting a ritual to lay a curse upon the Grand Narukami Shrine...
<color=#ccbfad>Hint: When you fight Abyss Mages of different Elemental Types simultaneously, the Swirl reaction might have unexpected results against them...</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Moneta della fortuna
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"This is the very same deck that the main character's nemesis used in King of Invokations!" Isn't this Yae Publishing House editor with the powerful deck just using the match as a pretext to find material that might help the novel's author break through their writer's block?
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Sacerdotessa degli specchi
customize.desc:
Emissaria dello specchio, Sacerdotessa di Snezhnaya

Tutti i segreti verranno nascosti all'interno dello specchio della luminosità sfolgorante...

customize.name: Mona
customize.desc:
Mona, Riflesso astrale

VVittoria o sconfitta? È tutto scritto nelle stelle.

customize.name: Bennett
customize.desc:
Bennett, Prova del fuoco

Quando capisci che stai per perdere, devi sapere come vincere.
